description:
Hiroki is mired down by unrequited love. But just as his life hits its lowest point, he has a chance meeting with a man who never lets anything hold him back: Nowaki. And Nowaki`s about to take him on a whirlwind ride that`ll turn everything upside-down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Knock, and It Shall Be Opened to You
叩けよさらば開かれん
